flawed_nl_solution:
Alice was able to stack 27 + 37 = <<27+37=66>>66 plates she already stacked.
The tower crashes when there are 83 plates - 66 plates already stacked = <<83-66=17>>17 plates she was able to stack before the tower crashed.
#### 17

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 64, not 66. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
